SONDE VANITY WALLET & TOKEN - MAINNET DEPLOYMENT
=================================================

OPTION 1: QUICK COMMANDS (Copy & Paste)
----------------------------------------

# 1. Generate vanity wallet starting with "Sond" (~15-30 min)
solana-keygen grind --starts-with Sond:1 --ignore-case

# OR for faster (3 chars "SND", ~30 seconds):
solana-keygen grind --starts-with SND:1 --ignore-case

# 2. Find the generated file
ls Sond*.json
# or
ls SND*.json

# 3. Save it properly
mkdir -p ~/sonde-wallet
mv Sond*.json ~/sonde-wallet/vanity-deployer.json
# (or mv SND*.json if you used that)

# 4. Get your vanity address
solana-keygen pubkey ~/sonde-wallet/vanity-deployer.json

# 5. Configure Solana for MAINNET
solana config set --keypair ~/sonde-wallet/vanity-deployer.json
solana config set --url https://api.mainnet-beta.solana.com

# 6. Send 1-2 SOL to your vanity address
# Buy SOL on Coinbase/Binance and send to the address from step 4

# 7. Check balance
solana balance

# 8. Create token (100 Billion supply)
spl-token create-token --decimals 9

# SAVE THE TOKEN MINT ADDRESS!

# 9. Set variable (replace with YOUR token mint)
TOKEN_MINT="<YOUR_TOKEN_MINT_HERE>"

# 10. Create token account
spl-token create-account $TOKEN_MINT

# 11. Mint 100 billion tokens
spl-token mint $TOKEN_MINT 100000000000

# 12. Verify
spl-token supply $TOKEN_MINT
spl-token balance $TOKEN_MINT

# 13. View on explorer
echo "https://solscan.io/token/$TOKEN_MINT"

‚úÖ DONE! Your vanity token is live on mainnet!


OPTION 2: AUTOMATED SCRIPT
---------------------------

We can create an automated script, but solana-keygen grind
doesn't work well in scripts. Better to run manually.


VANITY PATTERN OPTIONS:
-----------------------

Difficulty & Time Estimates:

Pattern         | Example                                    | Time
----------------|--------------------------------------------|---------
1 char          | S...                                       | Instant
2 chars         | SO...                                      | 1 sec
3 chars (SND)   | SND...                                     | 30 sec
4 chars (Sond)  | Sond...                                    | 30 min
5 chars (Sonde) | Sonde...                                   | 20 hours
6 chars         | SONDEx...                                  | 30 days

RECOMMENDED: Use "Sond" (4 chars) or "SND" (3 chars)


WHAT YOU'LL GET:
----------------

Vanity Wallet Example:
SondG7k3nYqZ8xqW5Yp9mK2rJ3hN4vQ8tL1sD6fA9cE2bT5

Token Mint Example:
(Random, but if lucky could also start with pattern)


AFTER DEPLOYMENT:
-----------------

1. Backup keypair:
   cp ~/sonde-wallet/vanity-deployer.json /usb/backup/

2. Create liquidity pool:
   https://raydium.io/liquidity/create-pool
   Pair: 50M SONDE + $25K USDC

3. Submit to CoinGecko:
   https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/new

4. Airdrop to Seeker wallets:
   spl-token transfer $TOKEN_MINT 500 <SEEKER_WALLET>


IMPORTANT NOTES:
----------------

‚ö†Ô∏è  This deploys to MAINNET (real money!)
‚ö†Ô∏è  You need 1-2 real SOL (~$150-300)
‚ö†Ô∏è  Backup your keypair immediately
‚ö†Ô∏è  Write down seed phrase when generating vanity wallet
‚ö†Ô∏è  Test on devnet first if unsure


SEED PHRASE:
------------

When you run solana-keygen grind, it will display:
"Save this seed phrase to recover your keypair: [12-24 words]"

WRITE THESE WORDS DOWN ON PAPER!
Store in 3 separate locations.

Without seed phrase, if you lose the keypair file,
your tokens are PERMANENTLY LOST!


READY TO DEPLOY?
-----------------

Start with step 1 above (generate vanity wallet).
Takes 15-30 minutes for "Sond" pattern.

Good luck! üöÄ
